blog.description: Follow to see the same picture of Goose the Cat every day.

tags: you do have a place in this world anon
summary: can i have the same picture of goose again because i feel like i have no place in this world and-
question: can i have the same picture of goose again because i feel like i have no place in this world and-
answer: Ok go on then, just this once

body:
Coffee’s for Closers, Part 1

Dark!Steve x Reader

Summary: the world is smaller than Y/N realizes; especially in the city of New York. Steve finds something that he didn’t know what he needed, but wasn’t going to let it go.

Warnings: not a whole lot in this first chapter lot of ground work being done but shit will get fucked up soon.

You walked into the coffee shop a few blocks from work getting a coffee for you and your boss. You were walking out the door while checking your email on your phone when you hit a solid chest. Coffee spilled down your white shirt causing you to scream out from the hot liquid.

“I am so sorry ma’am.” You looked up to see the one and only Captain America.

“No, no, it was my fault.” He looked embarrassed for a moment.

“Here let me replace the coffee, and the shirt.” He pulled something out form his back pocket.

“No, its fine, I have to get to work my boss will be waiting.” You ran off despite the attractive man in front of you. He never took his eyes off you following your every move down the sidewalk.

“Wait, how about I get you coffee sometime?” He didn’t want to let you get away so easily.

“Uh sure, um… phone?” He handed you a smartphone and you put your number in it, “I really do have to go, my boss is waiting on me.” You smiled to yourself, Captain freaking America asked for your number.


You were beaming for the rest of the day waiting for him to text or call but got nothing. The week stretched on and it was more of the same. As easily as he had ran into you he had forgot you all the same.

Your boss had told you he had a meeting in the avengers tower and had you carry his stuff. He was a sexist asshole but it paid well enough and he didn’t care about your lack of experience.

You followed him into the tower placing all the files on the table he directed you towards.

“Mr. Robinson!”

“Tony Stark, the legend.” They greeted each other with a hug. You turned when you felt the hairs on the back of your neck stand up, it was that feeling of being watched.

“And who is the lovely lady with you.” You turned back to look at Tony as he spoke.

“Ahhh, pay no mind that is just my assistant, miss… remind me of your name?” You dipped your head trying to hide the anger and embarrassment, you had worked with him for almost a year but he never learned your name.

“Miss Y/L/N,” He snapped his fingers as you said it repeating it and saying it was on the tip of his tongue. He dismissed you quickly saying the “men had to talk,” telling you to get him coffee. You waited until he couldn’t see your face before rolling your eyes.

You left the room still feeling that odd sensation of being watched.


You boarded the subway leaning against the pole waiting for the train to take off. You noticed the car was unusually empty. There was someone sitting at the other end of the car wearing a baseball hat and glasses. They were reading a paper copy of the news like some old gentleman, You pulled out your phone checking social media as you waited for your stop. You looked up when you heard the garbled voice announce the stop. You walked up the stairs into the Brooklyn night as you continued home.

You felt as if someone had been following you, quickly reaching into your purse grasping the mace within. You kept it in your grasp as you continued to walk. Once you got into the air lock of your apartment you let out a breath you did realize you had been holding.

You went up the two flights of stairs and went to the end of the hall wanting to be able to relax.

You opened your apartment feeling a cold breeze looking to see your window open you rushed over and closed it before checking the thermostat while taking off your jacket and shoes sighing in relief to be out of the flats. You walked into your kitchen and poured yourself a glass of wine before starting on dinner. You left then pasta to cook while you went to change from the slacks and scratchy shirt. You noticed that one of the drawers of your dresser was left open, probably from the rush of getting ready. You pushed your drawer of bras and panties closed before leaning down to another to grab some comfortable loungewear. You changed quickly slipping on some slippers before rushing back to the kitchen so you didn’t over cook your dinner.


Your boss had you running around picking up things for him, dry cleaning, coffee and lunch. You were about to return to the office when your phone went off.

“Hello?”

“I need you to run and get something from Mr. Stark.”

“Sir would you like me to drop off your lunch first?”

“Give it to the person in the lobby I need this ASAP.”

“Yes Sir.” You pushed open the doors of the office being met with the receptionist handing her the things you rushed right back into summer heat.

You walked into Avengers tower sighing at the rush of cold air. Walking up to the security desk.

“Ms. Y/L/N, you are expected. Take the elevator to the 80th floor.” they handed you an ID badge before pointing to the elevator behind them.

You let out a light thank you rushing to the elevator as the doors opened pushing the button for the 80th floor. You stepped away from the panel and stood in the corner looking at your shoes, you’d have to buy a new pair soon, there was scuff marks on them that was ruining the fabric. The doors opened and you saw someone else walk in, looking up you saw a man whose pants were nicely fitted before looking up to see a tuft of fimlar hair. The embarrassment of the other day weeks ago felt fresh as you tried to disappear into the elevator wall.

The elevator chimed 80th floor and you had to push past him seeing as he stood directly in front of the doorway. As you left you felt a slight brush against the back of your pants. You wrote it off as an accident, before proceeding down the hall.

“Miss Y/L/N right?” You found Mr Stark standing in a room surrounded by holographic screens and 3D models. You affirmed his question as you looked around the beautiful office space. “Your old school boss asked for paper copies of the contract. Let me grab them for you. You need anything, water, it’s warm outside correct? Hey Friday, can you ask someone to bring up two things of water, oh and something to eat this poor girl looks exhausted.” You tried to stop him but he didn’t let you get a word in edgewise. Continuing to work on whatever he had on his screen. A voice responded over speakers to his command.

“Hey Tony!” The sound of his voice made you jump, “Have you seen…” Steve looked over at you as you stood like a statue not sure what to do. “I know you, I’m sorry where have we met?” There was something uncomfortable about his gaze but you must have been paranoid, it was Steve Rogers he was one of the good guys.

“I ran into you a few weeks ago, spilled coffee everywhere.” You tore your gaze from him looking down on the floor.

“Oh right the beautiful girl from the coffee shop. You never called I was hoping to meet up again.” Tony just shrugged and continued working, he knew that Cap needed a personal life.

“I never got your number, You only had mine.” He chuckled at the meek response you gave as if he was trying to act normal.

“Well that’s a shame.”

“Excuse me Mr. Stark, Mr. Rogers, there is an incoming message from the department of defense.” The omnitionatinat voice sounded over the speakers.

“Tell them to wait,”

“Tony.”

“Fine, tell them 15 minutes.” Tony closed some of the screens and got up quickly. He handed you the manila folder quickly, “Sorry you didn’t get the break but can’t keep the government waiting, especially with the Captain over here.” You giggled slightly, if the whole world, yourself included, didn’t know he was taken you’d assume he was flirting with you.

“Thank you Mr. Stark.” You went to the elevator relieved when the doors closed.


The rest of that week was normal, when friday came you were so happy to walk into your apartment after taking the subway back to Brooklyn. You opened the door to see the window was left open and all the summer heat had entered the apartment. You closed it before going to make sure the air conditioning was on. You pulled out the open bottle of wine starting your usual daily routine of making dinner with a glass of wine. The wine tasted bitter compared to the glass from the night before. You finished the glass before pouring another and going to change. You made it to the doorway of the bedroom before stumbling and leaning against the wall. You shook your head trying to rid yourself of the dizzy feeling. You stood up and went towards your bed before falling to the floor. You swear you could feel arms wrapping around you and whispering something to you.

“Tony.”

“Fine, tell them 15 minutes.” Tony closed some of the screens and got up quickly. He handed you the manila folder quickly, “Sorry you didn’t get the break but can’t keep the government waiting, especially with the Captain over here.” You giggled slightly, if the whole world, yourself included, didn’t know he was taken you’d assume he was flirting with you.

“Thank you Mr. Stark.” You went to the elevator relieved when the doors closed.


The rest of that week was normal, when friday came you were so happy to walk into your apartment after taking the subway back to Brooklyn. You opened the door to see the window was left open and all the summer heat had entered the apartment. You closed it before going to make sure the air conditioning was on. You pulled out the open bottle of wine starting your usual daily routine of making dinner with a glass of wine. The wine tasted bitter compared to the glass from the night before. You finished the glass before pouring another and going to change. You made it to the doorway of the bedroom before stumbling and leaning against the wall. You shook your head trying to rid yourself of the dizzy feeling. You stood up and went towards your bed before falling to the floor. You swear you could feel arms wrapping around you and whispering something to you.

blog.name: themiscyracomics
blog.title: Themiscyra, le blog
blog.description: Themiscyra est un projet féministe consacré aux super-héroïnes des univers de comics.

summary: Critique : Captain Marvel - Toujours plus haut
title: Critique : Captain Marvel - Toujours plus haut
body:
Après la sortie de Captain Marvel au cinéma, Marvel a publié ce roman de Liza Palmer, intégré au canon du Marvel Cinematic Universe, pour compléter partiellement les origines de Carol Danvers. Kit l’a lu et vous propose aujourd’hui sa critique !

Résumé

Dès son premier jour à l'académie de l'U.S. Air Force, Carol Danvers est prévenue : donnez-vous le temps d'apprendre. Si seulement c'était aussi simple : aussi provocatrice qu'ambitieuse, Carol n'a jamais suivi les règles. Voler est de dont elle a toujours rêvé, alors pourquoi serait-elle dissuadée par le fait qu'à l'académie, les femmes pilotes de chasse n'existent pas ?

Derrière l'arrogance de Carol se cache la peur persistante de ne jamais être à la hauteur. Au début, l'académie semble lui donner raison, l'accablant sans cesse : un emploi du temps rigoureux, des officiers exigeants et l'infime chance de rejoindre un programme d'élite, les Flying Falcons, qui n'a jamais compté de femmes parmi ses rangs. Mais en se liant d'amitié avec une camarade - et future pilote - Maria Rambeau, ce qui lui semblait autrefois impossible devient à sa portée.

Carol et Maria parviendront-elles à réaliser leur rêve face à autant de défis ? Et à quel prix ? 

Critique

Premièrement, un conseil : si vous n'aimez pas l'armée, passez votre chemin, car l'intrigue se concentre essentiellement sur la première année d'études de Carol Danvers à l'académie de l’U.S. Air Force. Elle y rencontre Maria Rambeau qui partage la même chambre à l'académie. 

Le style d'écriture est plutôt simple et accessible, et pour ce qui est de l'histoire, ne vous attendez pas à de l'action ! On est plutôt sur de la tranche de vie. Il y a parfois quelques longueurs et l'autrice emploie de temps à autre des termes techniques qui vous feront peut-être décrocher du récit. 

Carol fait face rapidement à la misogynie du milieu militaire, que ce soit de la part des autres élèves, mais aussi de son supérieur, qui la harcèle. Elle ne se laissera pas faire, malheureusement l'autrice fait passer ça pour de l'arrogance ou de la provocation, ce que je trouve fort dommage. Il aurait été intéressant d'aborder le sujet du sexisme dans l'armée sachant que ce livre est destiné aux adolescent·es. 

La relation entre Carol et Maria est superbe, mais comme dans le film, encore une fois, on préfère qu'elles soient amies plutôt qu’en couple. 

En somme, un livre assez sympathique à lire surtout pour les fans de Captain Marvel bien qu’il enfonce le clou sur “l’amitié” de Carol et Maria.

Captain Marvel : Toujours plus haut est disponible en français pour 14,95€ chez Hachette Heroes et dans vos librairies !

Kit

summary: To Not Know Who I Am (But to Know That I'm Good Long as You're Here With Me) - sweeterthankarma - Captain Marvel (2019) [Archive...
title: To Not Know Who I Am (But to Know That I'm Good Long as You're Here With Me) - sweeterthankarma - Captain Marvel (2019) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Captain Marvel (2019)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Carol Danvers/Maria Rambeau
Characters: Carol Danvers, Maria Rambeau
Additional Tags: Missing Scene, Feelings
Summary:

“You know me better than anyone,” Carol says, almost like an announcement when they’re both settled and surrounded by the night. Carol’s words aren’t a question, aren’t a confession, aren’t an accusation or really anything at all. They’re just the truth.


Title comes from the song “I Like Me Better” by Lauv.

blog.description: Request Aesthetics, scenarios, one shots, headcannons,and preferences. However, Matchups will be limited since Tumblr keeps blocking them. My blog will contain nsfw materials but there will be warnings.  You'll the find the materlist in the tags or you can search it.

summary: Can I have some GoT, Star Wars, Marvel, HP, ships. I'm short, 5'3, blue-eyed Slytherin lesbian girl, I got dark brown hair and...
question: Can I have some GoT, Star Wars, Marvel, HP, ships. I'm short, 5'3, blue-eyed Slytherin lesbian girl, I got dark brown hair and pale skin, I'm trained in self-defense. My hobbies are sewing and singing. People say I'm crazy, in fact, i'm just a bit too lonely and rude.
answer:
A Got Matchup

Margaery Tyrell is your Game of Thrones Match. Margaery is Bisexual doesn’t change my mind so she’s not all afraid to fall in love with a girl. She loves that you’re able to sew suggesting you might make a dress for her. Doesn’t care what others say about you and is ready to defend you for that matter. The fact you know self-defense makes her confident with you since you’re her knight in charming armor. 

Marvel Matchup

Carol Danvers is your Marvel Match. She doesn’t think you’re rude able to see how lonely you’re and admits she likes your fire. She loves hearing you sing and drags you to karaoke where both of you can have fun. She’s glad you can defend yourself but will train you just in case to be extra prepared that nothing will happen to you. If she had to choose a favorite physical trait, it will be your eyes. 

HP Matchup

Luna Lovegood is your Harry Potter Match. Just like Carol doesn’t think you’re rude just sees how lonely you’re so she befriends and you can’t get angry at her at all. Do you sew? That’s great as she loves when you make something either for yourself or for her. She’s short as she’s 5’2 so you’re an inch taller than her. “Your eyes are like the ocean”, she says with a smile. Everyone kind of wonders how a Slytherin like you end with her but they get it when they are fully introduced to you. 

Star Wars Matchup 

Leia Organa is your Star Wars Match. She comes out as Bossy which is reasonable since she’s a general and a princess which means she’s understanding of your situation. She thinks you’re unique in your own and will be ready to punch anyone who wrongs or insults you. She can sing but she’s too shy though she loves hearing you sing.

summary: For the sake of this picture, imagine Maria is slightly bent for Carol to reach her on her tiptoes .  A headcanon of mine was...
caption:
For the sake of this picture, imagine Maria is slightly bent for Carol to reach her on her tiptoes .

A headcanon of mine was after Carol’s disappearance, Maria would never sleep correctly. She didn’t have that peace of mind she had with her wife anymore. She became an extreme light sleeper. So after 6 years, constant dark circles appeared under her eyes (I checked over several screenshots, but I believe Maria has dark circles in the movie, or maybe I am imagining things?)

So a story idea, even with Carol back into her life, Maria still has trouble sleeping, because at the beginning Carol didn’t have all her memory, then she fears one day her wife would leave for space for good and never come back. Carol would notice (she sees Maria awake in the middle of the night… most of the week) and ask Maria what’s wrong. The talk, drama, drama, Carol apologizes, Maria insists it’s not her fault, but Carol insists and promises she will never leave Maria ever again. 

Eventually, every night, Carol would help Maria fall asleep by kissing her eyes.

Maybe a possible prompt @tatooine-xtina??
